section.title: Users
section.p: If you use Nutch, please subscribe to the Nutch user mailing list.
The Nutch user mailing list is : nutch-user@apache.org.
section.note: In order to post to the list, it is necessary to first subscribe to it.

section.title: Developers
section.p: If you'd like to contribute to Nutch, please subscribe to the Nutch developer mailing list.
The Nutch developer mailing list is : nutch-dev@apache.org.
section.note: In order to post to the list, it is necessary to first subscribe to it.

section.title: Agents
section.p: If you use Nutch to perform extensive crawls of sites that you do not control, please subscribe to the Nutch agent mailing list. This is where we encourage webmasters to post questions about the Nutch crawler.
The Nutch agent mailing list is : nutch-agent@apache.org.
